TypeSignature.Value: public class FieldTemplateUserControl : System.Web.UI.UserControl, System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate, System.Web.UI.IBindableControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FieldTemplateUserControl extends System.Web.UI.UserControl implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate, class System.Web.UI.IBindableControl
Public Class FieldTemplateUserControl Inherits UserControl Implements IBindableControl, IFieldTemplate
public ref class FieldTemplateUserControl : System::Web::UI::UserControl, System::Web::DynamicData::IFieldTemplate, System::Web::UI::IBindableControl
type FieldTemplateUserControl = class inherit UserControl interface IBindableControl interface IFieldTemplate

summary.span: 表示所有字段模板控件的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for all field template controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 动态数据字段模板是映射到数据模型中的数据类型的数据控件的 ASP.NET 用户控件。ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. 字段模板派生自，可以访问数据字段、 数据列和数据模型中的元数据的类。Field templates derive from , the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. 动态数据项目提供默认情况下的字段模板。Dynamic Data projects provide field templates by default. 您可以修改默认情况下提供的字段模板或创建自定义字段模板。You can modify the field templates provided by default or create custom field templates. 此类继承类。This class inherits from the Class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建具有多对一关系和呈现的数据字段显示的字段模板将用户重定向到关系页的控件。The following code example creates a field template that displays data fields that have a many-to-one relationship and renders a control that redirects the user to the relationship page. 下面的示例演示 ForeignKey.ascx 用户控件的代码文件。The following example shows the code file for the ForeignKey.ascx user control. ```vb Public Partial Class ForeignKeyField Inherits System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl Protected Function GetDisplayString() As String Return FormatFieldValue( _ ForeignKeyColumn.ParentTable.GetDisplayString(FieldValue)) End Function Public Overloads Overrides ReadOnly Property DataControl() As Control Get Return HyperLink1 End Get End Property End Class ``` ```csharp public partial class ForeignKeyField : System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl { protected string GetDisplayString() { Return FormatFieldValue(ForeignKeyColumn.ParentTable.GetDisplayString(FieldValue)); public override Control DataControl { get { return HyperLink1; } } ``` 下面的示例演示 ForeignKey.aspx 文件。The following example shows the ForeignKey.aspx file. ```vb <%@ Control Language="VB" CodeFile="ForeignKey.ascx.vb" Inherits="ForeignKeyField" %> ``` ```csharp <%@ Control Language="C#" CodeFile="ForeignKey.ascx.cs" Inherits="ForeignKeyField" %> ``` 若要编译此代码示例，需要满足以下要求：To compile the example code, you need the following: - [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]。or [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a).

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是类似于，只不过它允许重写的 URL 的路径部分。This method is similar to , except that it allows the path part of the URL to be overridden. 如果页面未位于 DynamicData\CustomPages 文件夹中的动态数据项目，则使用此方法。This method is used if the pages are not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder of the Dynamic Data project. 此方法仅适用于子列。This method applies to Children columns only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的 URL 链接到的页面中显示的子实体列表。This method returns a URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities. 例如，在 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库中的 ProductCategories 表中的产品列具有链接到的产品列表中所选类别的 Url。For example, the products column in the ProductCategories table in the AdventureWorksLT sample database has URLs that link to the list of product that are in the selected category. 此属性仅适用于子列。This property only applies to children columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据列之间具有多对一关系，此属性返回 URL 链接到显示外键实体详细信息页。If the data column has a many-to-one relationship, this property returns a URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity. 例如，在 Northwind 数据库中的产品表类别列中，此方法可以返回到产品所属的类别的详细信息的链接。For example, in the Category column of the Product table in the Northwind Database, this method can return a link that goes to the details of the category that the product belongs to. 此属性仅适用于外键列。This property applies to foreign key columns only.

summary.span: 允许 忽略特定类型的模型验证特性。

span.span: Allows a to ignore a specific type of model validation attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许忽略特定类型的模型验证特性。This method allows a to ignore a specific type of model Validation attributes. 当特性类型已由 ASP.NET 调用此方法验证控件。This method is called when the attribute type is already handled by an ASP.NET validation controls. 而无需此调用，可以进行验证两次，从而导致重复的错误消息。Without this call, the validation can occur two times, resulting in a duplicate error message.
